; J9729A Configuration Editor; Created on release #WC.16.10.0012
; Ver #14:27.6f.f8.1d.9b.3f.bf.bb.ef.7c.59.fc.6b.fb.9f.fc.ff.ff.37.ef:fe

hostname "ARUBA-2920-SW01"
module 1 type j9729a
time daylight-time-rule continental-us-and-canada
time timezone -300
timesync sntp
sntp unicast
sntp server priority 1 10.0.0.1
console baud-rate 9600
console flow-control none
console idle-timeout 300
console idle-timeout serial-usb 300
trunk 1-2 trk1 lacp
ip routing
ip default-gateway 10.0.0.1
snmp-server community "public" unrestricted
snmp-server host 10.0.0.100 community "public"
vlan 1
   name "DEFAULT_VLAN"
   untagged 3-24
   ip address 10.0.1.10 255.255.255.0
   exit
vlan 100
   name "Users"
   untagged 25-48
   tagged Trk1
   ip address 10.0.100.1 255.255.255.0
   ip helper-address 10.0.0.50
   exit
vlan 200
   name "Servers"
   tagged 25-48,Trk1
   ip address 10.0.200.1 255.255.255.0
   exit
vlan 999
   name "Native"
   tagged Trk1
   exit
spanning-tree
spanning-tree priority 4
logging 10.0.0.100
password manager
password operator
aaa authentication console login local
aaa authentication console enable local
aaa authentication telnet login local
aaa authentication telnet enable local
aaa authentication ssh login public-key local
aaa authentication ssh enable local
ip ssh
